thread.section_title: Hotel Xenia Autograph Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Beautiful boutique hotel - Review of Hotel Xenia Autograph Collection, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: lilliannguyen86
title: Beautiful boutique hotel
text: As many had mentioned the size of the hotel room was made up by all the amenities that come with it. We stayed for one night in mid-February for an early flight out of Heathrow and chose this hotel as it is on the Piccadilly Line. I love both the interior and exterior of the hotel. The room was compact but well-designed. Water was provided and staff left some small cookies for us. I must send my compliment to Andres at the front desk who checked us in. He was extremely nice and recognized my Marriott status. I will definitely stay here again when in London.
